definitions.definition: A traditional county of Wales , bordered by Monmouthshire , Brecknockshire , and Carmarthenshire .
A former municipality in Tasmania , Australia , merged into Glamorgan-Spring Bay .
A neighbourhood in south-west Calgary , Alberta , Canada .
An unincorporated community and coal town in Wise County , Virginia , United States .

main_definition: A traditional county of Wales , bordered by Monmouthshire , Brecknockshire , and Carmarthenshire .
